entry.data:
CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 50S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS AROUND 80

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
